When Elena's friends take her to a party at a secret undisclosed location, she never imagined it would become the latest victim of the Collector a psychopathic killer. The Collector kidnaps her and takes her to an abandoned hotel, transformed in particular its maze of torture and death. When he learns of the disappearance of her daughter, Elena's rich father hires a group of mercenaries to retrieve her from the clutches of the Collector. Men require Arkin, the only man who escaped the wrath of this monster, to lead them the terrible maze. Now, Arkin must fight for his life to save Elena.
